expo._comment_app_identity: App identity for App Store / Play Store. Update 'name' for store listing, 'slug' is URL-safe identifier.
expo.name: GNB Transfer
expo._comment_versioning: VERSIONING STRATEGY: 'version' = semver for store listings. iOS 'buildNumber' and Android 'versionCode' must increment for EVERY store submission. See README for when to bump each.
expo._comment_ui: UI settings for consistent app experience across devices.
expo._comment_assets: TODO: Replace placeholder assets before store submission. See README for required sizes.
expo._comment_ios: iOS-specific configuration. buildNumber must increment for each App Store submission (including TestFlight).
expo._comment_android: Android-specific configuration. versionCode must increment for each Play Store upload (integer, monotonically increasing).

android._comment_permissions: No special permissions required. App uses text input for locations, no camera/gallery access.

expo._comment_web: Web bundle configuration (not primary target, but useful for development).
expo._comment_legal: TODO: Replace placeholder URLs with actual legal pages before store submission. Required for App Store & Play Store compliance.
expo._comment_updates: OTA (Over-The-Air) UPDATES CONFIGURATION. SAFETY RULES: OTA is ONLY for non-breaking JavaScript changes (bug fixes, text updates, minor UI tweaks). Breaking changes (navigation, auth flows, data models, native code) require a full store release. 'appVersion' policy ensures only compatible updates are delivered to matching native builds. OTA is automatically disabled in __DEV__ mode.
expo._comment_runtimeVersion: runtimeVersion uses 'appVersion' policy: OTA updates only delivered to app versions with matching native code. Increment version when native modules change.
